entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
